message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's exceptional quality and the benefits it can bring to you.

I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1200000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering my budget and the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1200000. Considering its unique value and the benefits it can bring, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's worth, and I believe it's a good compromise.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, $1800000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1500000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it, and I'm willing to make a compromise to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1700000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's worth, and I believe it's a good compromise.

I understand that you're still not willing to budge on the price, Alice. I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach an agreement. I'm willing to go up to $1600000 for the product. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
